subject: Basketball
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Marianne Stanley understands that the role of an assistant coach is not about visibility or accolades, even when the assistant has a résumé that few people in the sport can match.
snippet: Marianne Stanley understands that the role of an assistant coach is not about visibility or accolades, even when the assistant has a résumé that few people in the sport can match.
